adminCommands.name: timelog
adminCommands.title: Help - !timelog
adminCommands.description: The `!timelog` command sets the log channel for timeout events.
adminCommands.example:
`!timelog #general`
Sets the #general channel as the log channel.

adminCommands.name: skull
adminCommands.title: Help - !skull
adminCommands.description: The `!skull` command adds or removes a role ID for skull reactions.
adminCommands.example:
`!skull 123456789012345678`
Add or remove the role ID 123456789012345678 for skull reactions.

adminCommands.name: gptrole
adminCommands.title: Help - !gptrole
adminCommands.description: The `!gptrole` command assigns the 'gpt' role to a mentioned user.
adminCommands.example:
`!gptrole @username`
Assigns the 'gpt' role to the mentioned user.

gameCommands.name: startquiz
gameCommands.title: Help - !startquiz
gameCommands.description: The `!startquiz` command initiates a quiz game where users answer questions to score points.
gameCommands.example:
`!startquiz`
You will see a prompt to join the game.

gameCommands.name: startmathgame
gameCommands.title: Help - !startmathgame
gameCommands.description: The `!startmathgame` command initiates a math game where users solve math problems to score points.
gameCommands.example:
`!startmathgame`
You will see a prompt to join the game.

gameCommands.name: starthangman
gameCommands.title: Help - !starthangman
gameCommands.description: The `!starthangman` command initiates a hangman game where users guess letters to form a word.
gameCommands.example:
`!starthangman`
You will see a prompt to join the game.

gameCommands.name: startconnect4
gameCommands.title: Help - !startconnect4
gameCommands.description: The `!startconnect4` command initiates a connect 4 game where users try win in a four-in-a-row.
gameCommands.example:
`!startconnect4 @user`
Mention a user to start a connect 4 game with them and begin making moves.

gameCommands.name: startchessgame
gameCommands.title: Help - !startchessgame
gameCommands.description: The `!startchessgame` command initiates a chess game with another user.
gameCommands.example:
`!startchessgame @user`
Mention a user to start a chess game with them and begin making moves.

gameCommands.name: startblackjack
gameCommands.title: Help - !startblackjack
gameCommands.description: The `!startblackjack` command initiates a blackjack game.
gameCommands.example:
`!startblackjack`
You will see a prompt to join the game.

gameCommands.name: slots
gameCommands.title: Help - !slots
gameCommands.description: The `!slots` command initiates a slot machine game where users bet money.
gameCommands.example:
`!slots 100`
Place a bet of 100 and spin the slot machine.

gameCommands.name: move
gameCommands.title: Help - !move
gameCommands.description: The `!move` command makes a move in the current chess game.
gameCommands.example:
`!move e2 e4`
Make a move from e2 to e4.

gameCommands.name: resign
gameCommands.title: Help - !resign
gameCommands.description: The `!resign` command resigns from the current chess game.
gameCommands.example:
`!resign`
Resign from the current chess game.

gameCommands.name: draw
gameCommands.title: Help - !draw
gameCommands.description: The `!draw` command proposes a draw in the current chess game.
gameCommands.example:
`!draw`
Propose a draw in the current chess game.

gameCommands.name: promote
gameCommands.title: Help - !promote
gameCommands.description: The `!promote` command promotes a pawn in the current chess game.
gameCommands.example:
`!promote Q`
Promote a pawn to a Queen.

gameCommands.name: startgreentea
gameCommands.title: Help - !startgreentea
gameCommands.description: The `!startgreentea` command starts a green tea game.

gameCommands.name: startblacktea
gameCommands.title: Help - !startblacktea
gameCommands.description: The `!startblacktea` command starts a black tea game.

gameCommands.name: exitgame
gameCommands.title: Help - !exitgame
gameCommands.description: The `!exitgame` command ends any current game running either between 2 people or in a group
gameCommands.example:
`!exitgame`
This will automatically end the game. use wisely

generalCommands.name: balance
generalCommands.title: Help - !balance
generalCommands.description: The `!balance` command shows your current balance in the bot.
generalCommands.example:
`!balance`
The bot will display your current balance.

generalCommands.name: stats
generalCommands.title: Help - !stats
generalCommands.description: The `!stats` command fetches Fortnite stats for a given username.
generalCommands.example:
`!stats Ninja`
Fetch and display Fortnite stats for the username Ninja.

generalCommands.name: gpt
generalCommands.title: Help - !gpt
generalCommands.description: The `!gpt` command interacts with the chatbot using the provided prompt.
generalCommands.example:
`!gpt What is the weather like today?`
Interacts with the chatbot to get the weather information.

generalCommands.name: gptdraw
generalCommands.title: Help - !gptdraw
generalCommands.description: The `!gptdraw` command generates an image based on the provided prompt.
generalCommands.example:
`!gptdraw A futuristic cityscape`
Generates an image of a futuristic cityscape.
